title: How has visualization improved your life? - Quora

response.answer_text: Visualization has allowed me to travel the world, get jobs I wanted, get apartments I wanted. I have even manifested furniture!? LOL I also use visualization to maintain good health and send healing energy to others. I sometimes visualize the Earth and send out feelings of love and peace. This is a service to humanity that Rosicrucians perform. If you are really serious about developing the skill of visualization, I recommend considering study with The Rosicrucian Order, AMORC . A great book to read us “Creative Visualization“ by Shakti Gawain! This book encouraged me to begin to practice to develop my natural skill! Inward and Onward! Explore! Experiment! Experience! A2A #TogetherWeGrow #SarasotaRose Francesca C. Simon hosts "Charting Your Course" sessions on Facebook Live! on Sunday nights at 10 p.m. to 12 midnight, exploring mysticism, creative visualization, metaphysics, numerology, astrology, qabalah and tarot.
